title: Share of vaccinated health care personnel in long-term care facilities by job category U.S. 2021 | Statista
author: John Elflein; Aug 5
description: As of April 2021, around 45.6 percent of nurses in long-term care facilities in the United States were fully vaccinated against COVID-19, while 33.2 percent declined vaccination.
cleaned_text: U.S. health care personnel in long-term care facilities with COVID vaccination, 2021 [As of April 2021, around 45.6 percent of nurses in long-term care facilities in the United States were fully vaccinated against COVID-19, while 33.2 percent declined vaccination.
